Table of Contents

Interface ISyncCoordinatorService

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Services
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Service interface for synchronization coordinator that manages and coordinates background tasks. Handles feed updates, tag processing, cleanup operations, and backups with proper prioritization, error handling, and resource management for low-resource environments.

public interface ISyncCoordinatorService

Remarks

This service centralizes all background synchronization activities including:

  • Feed update scheduling based on individual feed frequencies
  • Article retention cleanup and database maintenance
  • Auto-tagging rule processing and tag statistics updates
  • Automated backup creation with rotation policies
  • Performance monitoring and error tracking

All methods return DTOs instead of internal models to maintain separation of concerns.

Properties

CurrentStatus

Gets the current overall synchronization status.

SyncStatusDto CurrentStatus { get; }

Gets aggregated statistics about synchronization performance.

Events

OnStatusChanged

Raised when the overall synchronization status changes.

Raised when a synchronization error occurs.
